document.heading: New Convention Center Hotel Technical Amendments Act of 2008

history.narrative: Law 17-339, the “New Convention Center Hotel Technical Amendments Act of 2008”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 17-774 which was referred to the Committee on Finance and Revenue. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on December 2, 2008, and December 16, 2008, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on January 6, 2009, it was assigned Act No. 17-657 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 17-339 became effective on March 21, 2009.
